text:
Hi Archer, would you be interested in freelancer work?

Contact me <mailto:Chanisa.Wallace@brightvision.com|Chanisa.Wallace@brightvision.com> if you are interested.

Look at <http://www.brightvision.com|www.brightvision.com> for more about us as a company.

***Update:  I will have a chat with a few people this week and will reach out if I need more applicants*

~Hi folks!~ 

~We are looking for a freelancer for HubSpot Developer who could help us with HubSpot CMS, Templates, API, Coded workflows, Custom objects, debugging, troubleshooting etc..~

~You can work from anywhere but must be able to align a few hours within the European timezone~

~No agency please~
